subject: Baseball
Defectors (Political)
lead_paragraph: Abreu, a White Sox slugger, will be joined by other major leaguers on the good-will tour as the Cuban government makes a rare concession toward Cuban players who have left.
snippet: Abreu, a White Sox slugger, will be joined by other major leaguers on the good-will tour as the Cuban government makes a rare concession toward Cuban players who have left.
